features.featureTitle: Update the segmented circumference progress indicator so the filled portion advances by exactly one segment every 8 seconds of elapsed session time (i.e., segment 1 fills at 8s, segment 2 at 16s, etc.), up to the total number of segments (totalDurationSeconds/8, rounded up). This change must only affect the segmented circumference timing/fill behavior and must not change the breathing circleâ€™s size, layout, colors, or other Player behavior.
